MajorClaims.MC1: married women nowadays have right to take up jobs like men when employment discrimination based on gender have been erased significantly
MajorClaims.MC2: married women could go to work in order to enjoy the working life outside the home

Claims.C1: Working outside home will bring a lot of benefits to both married woman and their household
Claims.C2: it is a normal practice for women to be helpmates in earning money
Claims.C3: a well-organized home does not need the housewife's presence the whole day long
Claims.C4: it is no doubt that they play roles as a mother and as a wife better
Claims.C5: there are many supporting conditions that help women balance housework and work

Premises.P1: extra income that women earn will contribute to their family's expenses
Premises.P2: By taking up a job, a wife can earn more money to support her family life
Premises.P3: This is really necessary in cases of her husband's low salary and the difficulty of getting a good job at the present
Premises.P4: working outside the house creates opportunities for married women to contact with the outer world, strengthen their character and show their capacity
Premises.P5: These things in turn will make them more confident, independent
Premises.P6: These women will set a good example for their children
Premises.P7: Besides the gorvernment's policies on limited families and their husbands' sharing in the housework, many employers are willing to offer part-time jobs for women
